BlockEditorFirstLine: Select the views to show. If no views are define then all the views allowed to the user profile will be shown
DeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this list?
UpdateErrorMSG: There is an error occurred, please fill mandatory fields before you update.
DisplayFieldError: Display field is not a field of that resource
ViewNotOfThatResourceError: View must be of the resource you sent
IllegalSelectionModeError: Selection mode has to be single or multi
SelectedKeysSingleSelectionError: The number of selected object keys cannot be greater than one if the selection mode is single
SelectedKeysMustBeArrayOrUndefinedError: Selected object keys must be an array of strings or undefined
NoSuchViewError: The view you sent is not exist
ResourceDoesNotExistOrHaveNoViewsError: The resource you sent is not exist or it has no views
ResourcePickerErr: the parameters that sent to the resource picker are wrong, please make sure you sent a resource name or a view key!
Name: Name
NameAlreadyTaken: Name is already taken, please choose another name.
